front.reference:
Journal of Nonlinear Mathematical Physics
Volume 12, Number 4 (2005), 457–461
Letter

byline.affiliation: Anadolu University, Science Faculty, Mathematics Department

front.note: Received October 21, 2004; Accepted in Revised Form January 18, 2005
front.div:
Abstract
The Seiberg-Witten equations are of great importance in the study of topology of
smooth four-dimensional manifolds. In this work, we propose similar equations for
7-dimensional compact manifolds with G 2 -structure.
